name: microservice-collector-manufacturers
description: This microservice is main service  of application, because it's collect data of partners
author: Danilo Mota and Luan Santos

scripts.docker:startApp: docker run -d  --env MONGO_URL='mongodb://mongodb:27017/vehicles' --env SQS_URL_DATE='http://localstack:4566/000000000000/data-reference-queue' --env SQS_URL_MANUFACTURER='http://localstack:4566/000000000000/manufacturer-queue' --env AWS_ENDPOINT='http://localstack:4566' --env AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=123 --env AWS_SECRET_KEY=123 --env REGION='us-east-1' --name microservice-controller-manufacturers --network networking-microservices microservice-manufacturer/node:1.0
scripts.create:queueSqsDate: aws sqs create-queue --queue-name data-reference-queue --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 --region us-east-1 --profile testelocal
scripts.create:queueSqsManufacturer: aws sqs create-queue --queue-name manufacturers-queue --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 --region us-east-1 --profile testelocal
scripts.start:mongoLocal: docker run -d  -p 27017:27017 --name mongodb --network network-microservice -v data-vol:/data/db mongo:latest
